properties.name: macAddress
properties.description: Client MAC Address to locate port

properties.name: interfaceUuid
properties.description: Port UUID for the port or connected device port

properties.name: adminStatus
properties.description: Change to Up Down or Reset

This workflow finds a targeted switchport via MAC 
Address or Device IP and Port and allows
modifications of description, admin status, 
or assigned Vlans
This allows for us to find the port to be modified depending on whether a MAC address or Device Address and Port were supplied
If a MAC address is supplied
Get Client Information to identify port its connected to.
Device IP and Port were supplied
Get Inventory to get switch UUID to get port UUID
Apply a description to the client connected port
Change the port status to: up, down or reset
Change the Vlan applied for data and voice
Change Vlan assignment for both voice and data vlan
Change Vlan assignment for both voice and data vlan
Change Vlan assignment for data vlan
Change Vlan assignment for data vlan
Change Vlan assignment for voice vlan
Change Vlan assignment for voice vlan
